activities:
The Medicines Company is a global pharmaceutical company.  As part of its business, The Medicines Company conducts or sponsors clinical trials to determine the safety and efficacy of the drugs it develops or has manufactured.   The Medicines Company also receives information about is European customers; while most of our customers are businesses, some customer information may identify or relate to an individual (e.g., the name and contact information of our main contact with a customer).

Our Safe Harbor Policy applies to the personal information we receive (i) from the EEA and Switzerland related to clinical trials and medical research studies conducted in the EEA and/or Switzerland, (ii) related to our customers located in the EEA and Switzerland, and (iii) employees located in the EEA and Switzerland.
